data.text: @DexterMorgan_64 @vancitysingh @Miss604 Yep, pretty clear that it is in fact due to covid and the ever changing protocols that they couldn't plan for. They didn't want to waste people's money who donate.
@vancitysingh @Miss604 Your photo clearly states that it takes 1 year to plan and Covid and it’s Covid restrictions constantly changing is the reason. So it was due to Covid related reasons.

@vancitysingh preparation for the event only to have sporadic and last minute changes to the public health orders in the future and be pushed to cancel the event later and lose donations which are for supporting important programs in our community,” says Gurdwara Sahib Dasmesh Darbar President

@vancitysingh Covid is the reason as well: “We are a Sikh Gurdwara that operates through donations from the Sikh sangat (congregation) and we feel it would be irresponsible on our part to go forward at this time and spend hundreds of thousands of dollars on deposits and expenditures in ....
